channel.title: Computing courses
channel.description:
Basically from year 10 upto this point I've done mechanics courses and trained to be a mechanic, I've decided that it's just not as appealing. No one in my area is employing anyone, there are no real job opportunities with the exception of me going to Nottingham for 6 weeks release.
I've decided that I'd rather do something computing wise and my local colleges do computing courses, so for anyone who's done these courses before can you tell me the pros and cons of them so that I can decide if I want to do them?

item.title: Computing courses
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:3, topic:307061”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=403211.msg2986610#msg2986610 date=1255031181]
If you have project lead the way at your school, you should sign up for it
http://www.pltw.org/
[/quote]

I don’t go to school.[/quote]
They still offer this course in college. I think…

Read full topic
